Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Eberhart
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Ellis and 131st due to, street blockage near 130th/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 130th, Ellis and 131st due to, street blockage near 130th/Eberhart.

Allow extra travel time.
